<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->

          <tr data-ng-repeat="team in conferenceData.teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="rank" data-ng-class="{rankClinchedDivision: false, rankClinchedDivision: false, rankEliminated: false}">{{ team.standings.confRank || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="team-name"><span class="team-standing-logo"><img data-ng-src="/media/img/teams/logos/{{ team.profile.abbr}}_logo.svg"></span><span class="clinched-icon">{{ team.standings.clinched }} </span><a data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}" sib-team-urls team="team.profile"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.wins || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.losses || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Standings -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winPct | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.confGamesBehind | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.confWin  | number:0}} - {{ team.standings.confLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.divWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.divLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.homeWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.homeLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.roadWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.roadLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==4)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Streaks -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.homeStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.roadStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.loseStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Home || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Road || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Margin -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.score100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.score100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.oppover500Win || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppover500Loss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctwin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctloss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInRebWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInRebLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Ahead -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsFor | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsAgainst | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsDiff | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>

        <tbody data-ng-show="tabbed=='division'" data-ng-repeat="division in divisionStandings[ conferenceIndex ].divisions">
          <tr class="caption">
            <td colspan="100%">
              <h6>{{ division.displayDivision }}</h6>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-ng-repeat="team in division.teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="rank" data-ng-class="{rankClinchedDivision: false, rankClinchedDivision: false, rankEliminated: false}">{{ team.standings.confRank || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="team-name"><span class="team-standing-logo"><img data-ng-src="/media/img/teams/logos/{{ team.profile.abbr}}_logo.svg"></span><span class="clinched-icon">{{ team.standings.clinched }} </span><a data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}" sib-team-urls team="team.profile"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.wins || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.losses || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Standings -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winPct | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.confGamesBehind | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.confWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.confLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.divWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.divLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.homeWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.homeLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.roadWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.roadLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==4)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Streaks -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.homeStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.roadStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.loseStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Home || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Road || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Margin -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.score100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.score100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.oppover500Win || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppover500Loss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctwin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctloss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInRebWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInRebLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Ahead -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsFor | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsAgainst | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsDiff | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>

      <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>

    </div>

    <div class="col-sm-12">

<a href="javascript:void(0);" class="masthead-close" id="masthead-close">Fechar anúncio</a>
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="22">r7ad.printGAds([970,250],'masthead').success(function(){'use strict';document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='block';$(document).ready(function(){document.getElementById('masthead-close').style.display='block';var hideCallback=function(){document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='none';};var onMastheadClose=function(e){e.preventDefault();$('#masthead').animate({height:0,opacity:0.4},500,hideCallback);};if($('.box.proximos_programas').length>0){$('.box.proximos_programas').addClass('masthead-true');}

<div class="row r7section-row ">
<div class="column r7cl5 ">
<div>
<div class="box rw noticias_por_tags_com_fotos" id="box_57f79e2c08c6bb7903004254">

<div id="ad-slot-noticias-por-tags">

</div>
</div>
</div>
<script type="text/template" id="photo-noticias-por-tags">
  <div class="article-photo">
    <img alt="" class="article-video-icon article-video-icon-big" style="display: {{ is_video }}" src="data:image/png;base64," />
    <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
      <div class="image-holder">
        <a title="{{ titulo }}" href="{{ url }}" data-social-headline="{{ titulo }}" data-social-lead="{{ titulo }}" data-shorten="{{ url }}">
          <figure>
            <img src="{{ image }}" alt="{{ titulo }}" width="240" height="135" />
          </figure>
        </a>
            <div class="r7-shareit-bar">
        <strong>Compartilhe</strong>
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter" class="r7-icons r7-twitter shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="gPlus" title="Compartilhe no Google Plus" class="r7-icons r7-gPlus shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="pinterest" title="Compartilhe no Pinterest" class="r7-icons r7-pinterest shareit"></li>
        </ul>
    </div>

      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content">
      <a href="{{url}}" class="link" title="{{titulo}}">{{titulo}}</a>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/template" id="not-photo-noticias-por-tags">
  <li class="article-list">
    <a href="{{url}}" class="content">
      <p title="{{titulo}}" class="article-list-text">{{titulo}}</p>
    </a>
  </li>
</script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="column r7cl2 r7omega">

          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">

                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">

                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

</div>

</div>
<div class="box rw chamada_com_foto" id="box_56df3e406745ee28d4006fa6">
<div class="r7box r7-shareit-holder">
<div class="image-holder">

          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">     

              {{#if showDate}}

              {{/if}}
              <div class="clearfix"></div>
              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                            <img class="nwl-cover-reference" src="{{treatment_image cover_image_url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" width="180" height="95" />
                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter" class="r7-icons r7-twitter shareit"></li>

        </ul>
    </div>

                      </div>                      
                  </div>
                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                <div class="nwl-info">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
                    <p class="nwl-news-title">

                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>

<div id="r7-footer-portal-holder">
<div id="r7-footer-cols">
<ul id="r7-sitemap">
<li id="r7-sitemap-noticias" class="r7-cols">
<h3><a href="http://noticias.r7.com/" title="Ir para a página de Notícias">Notícias</a></h3>
<ul>
<li><a title="Ir para Bahia" href="http://noticias.r7.com/bahia">Bahia</a></li>
<li><a title="Ir para Brasil" href="http://noticias.r7.com/brasil/">Brasil</a></li>
<li><a title="Ir para Carros" href="http://noticias.r7.com/carros/">Carros</a></li>
